column1: According to economists David Castells-Quintana and Vicente Royuela, increasing inequality harms economic growth. High and persistent unemployment, in which inequality increases, has a negative effect on subsequent long-run economic growth. Unemployment can harm growth not only because it is a waste of resources, but also because it generates redistributive pressures and subsequent distortions, drives people to poverty, constrains liquidity limiting labor mobility, and erodes self-esteem promoting social dislocation, unrest and conflict. Policies aiming at controlling unemployment and in particular at reducing its inequality-associated effects support economic growth.
column2: Po mnenju ekonomistov David Castells-Quintana in Vicente Royuela vse večja neenakost škoduje gospodarski rasti. Visoka in vztrajna brezposelnost, v kateri se neenakost povečuje, negativno vpliva na posledično dolgoročno gospodarsko rast. Brezposelnost lahko škoduje rasti ne le zato, ker je zapravljanje virov, ampak tudi zato, ker ustvarja prerazporeditvene pritiske in posledična izkrivljanja, ljudi spodbuja k revščini, omejuje likvidnost, ki omejuje mobilnost delovne sile, in spodkopava samospoštovanje, ki spodbuja socialno dislokacijo, nemire in konflikte. Gospodarske rasti podpirajo politike, katerih cilj je obvladovanje brezposelnosti in zlasti zmanjšanje njenih učinkov, povezanih z neenakostjo.

column1: What was persistent unemployment have a negative effect on?
column2: Na kaj je vztrajna brezposelnost negativno vplivala?

column1: Western medicine was also practiced in China by the Nestorian Christians of the Yuan court, where it was sometimes labeled as huihui or Muslim medicine. The Nestorian physician Jesus the Interpreter founded the Office of Western Medicine in 1263 during the reign of Kublai. Huihui doctors staffed at two imperial hospitals were responsible for treating the imperial family and members of the court. Chinese physicians opposed Western medicine because its humoral system contradicted the yin-yang and wuxing philosophy underlying traditional Chinese medicine. No Chinese translation of Western medical works is known, but it is possible that the Chinese had access to Avicenna's The Canon of Medicine.
column2: Zahodno medicino so na Kitajskem prakticirali tudi nestorski kristjani juanskega dvora, kjer je bila včasih označena kot Huihui ali muslimanska medicina. Nestorski zdravnik Jezus, tolmač, je leta 1263 ustanovil Urad za zahodno medicino med vladavino Kublaja. Huihui zdravniki, zaposleni v dveh cesarskih bolnišnicah, so bili odgovorni za zdravljenje cesarske družine in članov dvora. Kitajski zdravniki so nasprotovali zahodni medicini, ker je njegov humoralni sistem nasprotoval filozofiji yin-yang in wuxing filozofiji, ki je temeljila na tradicionalni kitajski medicini. Kitajski prevod zahodnih medicinskih del ni znan, vendar je možno, da so Kitajci imeli dostop do Avicenna’s Canon of Medicine.

column1: The reason for the order of the classes and the reason why people were placed in a certain class was the date they surrendered to the Mongols, and had nothing to do with their ethnicity. The earlier they surrendered to the Mongols, the higher they were placed, the more the held out, the lower they were ranked. The Northern Chinese were ranked higher and Southern Chinese were ranked lower because southern China withstood and fought to the last before caving in. Major commerce during this era gave rise to favorable conditions for private southern Chinese manufacturers and merchants.
column2: Razlog za vrstni red razredov in razlog, zakaj so bili ljudje postavljeni v določen razred, je bil datum, ko so se predali Mongolom in niso imeli nič opraviti s svojo etnično pripadnostjo. Prej ko so se predali Mongolom, višje so bile postavljene, bolj ko so se zadrževale, nižje so bile uvrščene. Severna Kitajci so bili uvrščeni višje in južna Kitajci so bili uvrščeni nižje, ker je južna Kitajska zdržala in se borila do zadnjega pred jamarstvom. Velika trgovina v tem obdobju je povzročila ugodne pogoje za zasebne južnokitajske proizvajalce in trgovce.

The National Science Foundation Network (NSFNET) was a program of coordinated, evolving projects sponsored by the National Science Foundation (NSF) beginning in 1985 to promote advanced research and education networking in the United States. NSFNET was also the name given to several nationwide backbone networks operating at speeds of 56 kbit/s, 1.5 Mbit/s (T1), and 45 Mbit/s (T3) that were constructed to support NSF's networking initiatives from 1985-1995. Initially created to link researchers to the nation's NSF-funded supercomputing centers, through further public funding and private industry partnerships it developed into a major part of the Internet backbone.
column2: National Science Foundation Network (NSFNET) je bil program usklajenih, razvijajočih se projektov, ki jih podpira National Science Foundation (NSF) z začetkom leta 1985 za spodbujanje naprednih raziskav in izobraževanja mreženje v Združenih državah Amerike. NSFNET je bil tudi ime več hrbteničnih omrežij po vsej državi, ki so obratovala s hitrostjo 56 kbit/s, 1,5 Mbit/s (T1) in 45 Mbit/s (T3), ki so bila zgrajena za podporo pobudam NSF za mreženje v obdobju 1985–1995. Prvotno ustvarjena za povezavo raziskovalcev z nacionalnimi superračunalniškimi centri, ki jih financira NSF, z nadaljnjim javnim financiranjem in partnerstvi zasebne industrije se je razvil v večji del internetne hrbtenice.

In addition to the Riemann hypothesis, many more conjectures revolving about primes have been posed. Often having an elementary formulation, many of these conjectures have withstood a proof for decades: all four of Landau's problems from 1912 are still unsolved. One of them is Goldbach's conjecture, which asserts that every even integer n greater than 2 can be written as a sum of two primes. As of February 2011[update], this conjecture has been verified for all numbers up to n = 2 · 1017. Weaker statements than this have been proven, for example Vinogradov's theorem says that every sufficiently large odd integer can be written as a sum of three primes. Chen's theorem says that every sufficiently large even number can be expressed as the sum of a prime and a semiprime, the product of two primes. Also, any even integer can be written as the sum of six primes. The branch of number theory studying such questions is called additive number theory.
column2: Poleg Riemannove hipoteze je bilo predstavljenih še veliko več domnev, ki se vrtijo o praštevilih. Pogosto imajo osnovno formulacijo, mnogi od teh domnev so prestali dokaz že desetletja: vsi štirje problemi Landaua iz leta 1912 so še vedno nerešeni. Ena od njih je Goldbachova domneva, ki trdi, da je vsako celo število n večje od 2 mogoče zapisati kot vsoto dveh praštevil. Od februarja 2011[posodobitev] je bila ta domneva preverjena za vse številke do n = 2· 1017. Šibkejše izjave od tega so bile dokazane, na primer Vinogradovov izrek pravi, da se lahko vsako dovolj veliko liho celo število zapiše kot vsota treh praštevil. Chenov izrek pravi, da se lahko vsako dovolj veliko enakomerno število izrazi kot vsota praštevil in polprima, produkta dveh praštevil. Prav tako lahko vsako celo število zapišemo kot vsoto šestih praštevil. Veja teorije števil, ki preučuje takšna vprašanja, se imenuje teorija aditivnih števil.

column1: It is usually recognized that lawbreaking, if it is not done publicly, at least must be publicly announced in order to constitute civil disobedience. But Stephen Eilmann argues that if it is necessary to disobey rules that conflict with morality, we might ask why disobedience should take the form of public civil disobedience rather than simply covert lawbreaking. If a lawyer wishes to help a client overcome legal obstacles to securing her or his natural rights, he might, for instance, find that assisting in fabricating evidence or committing perjury is more effective than open disobedience. This assumes that common morality does not have a prohibition on deceit in such situations. The Fully Informed Jury Association's publication "A Primer for Prospective Jurors" notes, "Think of the dilemma faced by German citizens when Hitler's secret police demanded to know if they were hiding a Jew in their house." By this definition, civil disobedience could be traced back to the Book of Exodus, where Shiphrah and Puah refused a direct order of Pharaoh but misrepresented how they did it. (Exodus 1: 15-19)
column2: Običajno se priznava, da mora biti kršenje zakonov, če se ne izvaja javno, vsaj javno objavljeno, da bi pomenilo civilno neposlušnost. Toda Stephen Eilmann trdi, da če je treba kršiti pravila, ki so v nasprotju z moralo, bi se lahko vprašali, zakaj bi neposlušnost morala imeti obliko javne državljanske neposlušnosti in ne zgolj prikritega kršenja zakonov. Če odvetnik želi pomagati stranki pri premagovanju pravnih ovir za zagotovitev njenih naravnih pravic, lahko na primer ugotovi, da je pomoč pri izdelavi dokazov ali prisega bolj učinkovita od odprte neposlušnosti. To predpostavlja, da skupna moralnost nima prepovedi prevare v takih situacijah. Publikacija Združenja žirij „Primer za verjetnostne jurje“ ugotavlja, da „Razmišljaj o dilemi, s katero se soočajo nemški državljani, ko je Hitlerjeva tajna policija zahtevala, da izve, ali so v svoji hiši skrivali Juda.“ Po tej definiciji je civilno neposlušnost mogoče izslediti nazaj v Knjigo Exodus, kjer sta Shiphrah in Puah zavrnila neposreden ukaz faraona, vendar napačno prikazala, kako sta to storila. (Exodus 1: 15–19)

column1: Parliament typically sits Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursdays from early January to late June and from early September to mid December, with two-week recesses in April and October. Plenary meetings in the debating chamber usually take place on Wednesday afternoons from 2 pm to 6 pm and on Thursdays from 9:15 am to 6 pm. Chamber debates and committee meetings are open to the public. Entry is free, but booking in advance is recommended due to limited space. Meetings are broadcast on the Parliament's own channel Holyrood.tv and on the BBC's parliamentary channel BBC Parliament. Proceedings are also recorded in text form, in print and online, in the Official Report, which is the substantially verbatim transcript of parliamentary debates.
column2: Parlament običajno sedi ob torkih, sredah in četrtkih od začetka januarja do konca junija in od začetka septembra do sredine decembra, z dvotedenskimi počitnicami v aprilu in oktobru. Plenarna zasedanja v sejni dvorani običajno potekajo v sredo popoldne od 14.00 do 18.00 in ob četrtkih od 9.15 do 18.00. Razprave sejnih sej in seje odborov so odprte za javnost. Vstop je brezplačen, vendar je zaradi omejenega prostora priporočljiva predhodna rezervacija. Seje se predvajajo na lastnem kanalu Parlamenta Holyrood.tv in na parlamentarnem kanalu BBC parlamenta BBC. Postopki so zapisani tudi v obliki besedila, tiskani in na spletu, v uradnem poročilu, ki je vsebinsko dobesedno prepis parlamentarnih razprav.

column1: There were 158,349 households, of which 68,511 (43.3%) had children under the age of 18 living in them, 69,284 (43.8%) were opposite-sex married couples living together, 30,547 (19.3%) had a female householder with no husband present, 11,698 (7.4%) had a male householder with no wife present. There were 12,843 (8.1%) unmarried opposite-sex partnerships, and 1,388 (0.9%) same-sex married couples or partnerships. 35,064 households (22.1%) were made up of individuals and 12,344 (7.8%) had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 3.07. There were 111,529 families (70.4% of all households), the average family size was 3.62.
column2: Bilo je 158.349 gospodinjstev, od katerih jih je 68.511 (43,3 %) imelo otroke, mlajše od 18 let, 69.284 (43,8 %) poročenih parov nasprotnih spolov, 30,547 (19,3 %) je imelo gospodinjstvo brez moža, 11.698 (7,4 %) je imelo moškega gospodinjstva brez žene. Bilo je 12.843 (8,1 %) neporočenih partnerjev nasprotnega spola in 1.388 (0,9 %) istospolnih parov ali partnerstev. 35.064 gospodinjstev (22,1 %) je sestavljalo posameznike, 12.344 (7,8 %) pa je imelo osebo, ki je živela sama in je bila stara 65 let ali več. Povprečna velikost gospodinjstva je bila 3,07. 111,529 družin (70,4 % vseh gospodinjstev), povprečna velikost družine je bila 3,62.

column1: As of April 2014, there are 88 private schools in New Zealand, catering for around 28,000 students or 3.7% of the entire student population. Private school numbers have been in decline since the mid-1970s as a result of many private schools opting to become state-integrated schools, mostly due of financial difficulties stemming from changes in student numbers and/or the economy. State-integrated schools keep their private school special character and receives state funds in return for having to operate like a state school, e.g. they must teach the state curriculum, they must employ registered teachers, and they can't charge tuition fees (they can charge "attendance dues" for the upkeep on the still-private school land and buildings). The largest decline in private school numbers occurred between 1979 and 1984, when the nation's then-private Catholic school system integrated. As a result, private schools in New Zealand are now largely restricted to the largest cities (Auckland, Hamilton, Wellington and Christchurch) and niche markets.
column2: Od aprila 2014 je na Novi Zelandiji 88 zasebnih šol, ki skrbijo za okoli 28.000 študentov ali 3,7 % celotne študentske populacije. Število zasebnih šol od sredine sedemdesetih let upada, saj so se številne zasebne šole odločile, da bodo postale državne šole, predvsem zaradi finančnih težav, ki izhajajo iz sprememb v številu učencev in/ali gospodarstvu. Šole, vključene v državo, ohranjajo svoj poseben značaj zasebne šole in prejemajo državna sredstva v zameno za to, da morajo delovati kot državna šola, npr. poučevati morajo državni učni načrt, zaposliti morajo registrirane učitelje in ne morejo zaračunati šolnine (lahko zaračunajo „pristojbine“ za vzdrževanje še vedno zasebnega šolskega zemljišča in stavb). Največji upad števila zasebnih šol se je zgodil med 1979 in 1984, ko se je takrat zasebni katoliški šolski sistem združil. Zato so zasebne šole na Novi Zelandiji zdaj v veliki meri omejene na največja mesta (Auckland, Hamilton, Wellington in Christchurch) in nišne trge.
